summary: "Rumours" is the 11th album by Fleetwood Mac, released in 1977. It was made in California while band members were going through breakups and drug issues. The album has a mix of electric and acoustic sounds, with lyrics about relationships. It became their first UK number-one album and topped the US charts. With over 40 million copies sold, it won a Grammy for Album of the Year and is considered one of the greatest albums ever.
title: Rumours (album)
